name: UploadBooth
overview:
UploadBooth is a service that enables you to upload and share tagged files with others online in a simple way. No logging in necessary. n

Features not seen elsewhere include “smart” UI features: start uploading multiple files at once before filling out any details.

– how it works –

Files are uploaded in batches, think of batches as folders that contain multiple files. Files that are uploaded under a batch can be shared with anyone via your personalized uploadbooth site.

—- Features overview —

  1. generous upload limit - 100mb per file / unlimited files per batch.
  2. API to upload and manipulate data from third party applications.
  3. multi-file select (ability to select multiple files in the file selection dialog) / multi-file queued upload.
  4. personalized pages <username>.uploadbooth.com
  5. password protect / tagging / notes
  6. Social billboard to link your blog and twitter feeds on your personalized uploadbooth site.
  7. gravatar support.
  8. intuitive UI / simplicity - everything removed but bare essentials to get your media online.
